meanings: have a slim chance of success

vlive.korean: 그리고 저희한테 너희 뭐냐 싹수없게 반말하지. And she rudely asked who we were. 듣기 View video 홍익슈퍼 (HONG IK SUPER) : [홍익슈퍼]EP13_ 위기에 빠진 연희
vlive.english: And she rudely asked who we were.

examples.korean: The way that kid talks back to his elders, he'll grow up to be no good. 발음듣기 어린 녀석이 어른한테 대드는 걸 보니 싹수가 노랗다 Neungyule
examples.english: The way that kid talks back to his elders, he'll grow up to be no good. 발음

examples.korean: Considering that he already goes through his mother's wallet, I can see that he's got no future. 발음듣기 벌써부터 어머니 지갑을 뒤지는 것을 보니 그도 싹수가 노랗다 Neungyule
examples.english: Considering that he already goes through his mother's wallet, I can see that he's got no future. 발음
